name: ~Linked~
description:
Your goal is to get each character in one of the blue areas at the same time, but careful, their movements are opposed.

Controls: WASD to move

Left/Right Click to slide/crouch and jump

Spacebar to shoot
Crouch in buttons to activate them and open doors

Game done in a week for "Spanish Game Devs Jam" and the theme was "Action, Reaction"

Made by a group of three:

-Arturo Rodríguez
-Miguel Ortiz
-Pablo Pérez
